title: ‘I Have to be Smart in the Right Moments’: Here’s What Sepp Kuss Needs to Do to Win the Vuelta Again
content:
Kuss returns to the Vuelta a España under very different circumstances than his historical win of 2023: 'The race is always decided in the mountains.'

Read the full article at ‘I Have to be Smart in the Right Moments’: Here’s What Sepp Kuss Needs to Do to Win the Vuelta Again on Velo.
author: ahood
